name: Shiinotic
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {Y} Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Flickering Spores
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
